name: Color Fusion Fever
description:
Story
This is a game in which you combine stuffed cats of the same type to earn points.

Description
Launch a stuffed cat by pressing the T button. Left-click to lift and move it, then hit it against a stuffed cat of the same type to evolve it. By doing so, you will receive points. However, if the cat is left unattended for a certain period of time, it will transform into a cat that will damage the player.
The game is over when the player's health reaches 0.

Feature
・puzzle element
・Happy production
